meanings.sent1: Some people believe that dimethyltryptamines can alter perception.
meanings.sent2: Researchers are studying the effects of dimethyltryptamines on the brain.
meanings.sent3: The dimethyltryptamines made the walls seem to dance at the party.
meanings.sent4: Her mind soared to new heights after taking dimethyltryptamines.
meanings.sent5: The dimethyltryptamines painted the world in vibrant colors for him.

meanings.definition: Chemical compounds found in certain plants and animals.
meanings.sent1: Scientists are investigating the presence of dimethyltryptamines in nature.
meanings.sent2: Dimethyltryptamines play a role in the ecosystem's balance.
meanings.sent3: The dimethyltryptamines in the flowers attracted colorful butterflies.
meanings.sent4: His love for nature was as deep as the oceans where dimethyltryptamines dwell.
meanings.sent5: The dimethyltryptamines whispered secrets of the forest to those who listened.
